subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Rafael Nadal breezed past Michael Berrer, 6-0, 6-1, on Thursday and joined four other Spaniards in the quarterfinals of the Monte Carlo Masters.
snippet: Second-seeded Rafael Nadal breezed past Michael Berrer, 6-0, 6-1, on Thursday and joined four other Spaniards in the quarterfinals of the Monte Carlo Masters.
